short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Symbo Chrome extension allows you to interact with your CRM tool to engage with your prospects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Symbo is a full-feature sales engagement platform. Close more deals with Sales Essentials. Boost your prospecting activity, automate repetitive tasks, and maintain sales velocity with Symbo.

Engage - Drive prospects through series of steps to move the sales process forward, consisting of automated and manual emails, calls, video, social touches, and tasks.

Pipeline - Plug the leaks in your pipeline and maintain sales velocity at scale by automating both next steps and record keeping.

Improve - Optimize your sales team performance through A/B testing and metrics that track email effectiveness, call talk time, and drive outcomes.

Key Features:
- Drives - Multichannel engagement plans to connect with your prospects.
- Email Automation - Send personalized emails and automate follow up.
- Analytics - Track team performance and improve your outreach.
- Dialer - Connect with prospects, record calls, and view call insights.
- A/B Testing - Test email variations to compare reply rates.
- Integrations - Integrate with email, CRM, and meeting apps.

An account is required to use this extension. You can sign up at https://www.symbo.ai or by contacting team@symbo.ai.
